meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dennis Fawcett Anupama Srirangan Ivan Plis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7596.

td.p: Dennis Fawcett, a painter and handyman from San Diego, California
Anupama Srirangan, a technology director from Aurora, Illinois
Ivan Plis, a magazine editor from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,200)

tr.td: THE WORKS OF VICTOR HUGO
HORSE SENSE
NFL TEAMS BY HALL OF FAMER
ONE STATE, UNDER CANADA
(Alex: We're featuring states that share a border with our neighbor to the north.)
COMPOUND WORDS
LIBRARIANS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In "The Last Day of a Condemned Man," a prisoner wakes up every morning knowing each day could lead to this instrument of doom')

tr.td: In "The Last Day of a Condemned Man," a prisoner wakes up every morning knowing each day could lead to this instrument of doom
